ComicInfo.Summary: Advent: Dani's new boyfriend turns out to be the son of Kenneth Irons and he has stolen her half of the Witchblade. When he tries to do the same to Sara, he bests her in battle but finds he cannot take the Witchblade from her. Gerard uses the part of the Witchblade he has stolen to face down one of his ancient enemies, a disfigured Templar knight. Sara arrives too late to save Renaud, but she gets a second shot at Gerard and is able to take him down so Dani can retrieve her portion of the Witchblade.
